original_title: Harin, Manusha reappointed to UNP working Committee
original_body_lines: Ministers Harin Fernando and Manusha Nanayakakra were reappointed to the UNP w Working committee today.
The decision to include the two Ministers was made at the UNP Working Committee which met at party headquarters Sirikotha this evening.
The suspension of the two Ministers from the UNP were also removed as per the decision of the Working Committee.
The UNP membership of Ministers Fernando and Nanayakkara were suspended along with others when they formed the Samagi Jana Balawegaya (SJB) in 2020.
The Daily Mirror also learned that the memberships of several other SJBers will be restored soon as and when they start crossing over to the UNP. (Yohan Perera]
